a surprisingly fun and fast roguelike with a satisfying amount of weapons to unlock builds to try and gameplay that relies more on skill expression than getting exactly the right rng options quite a few areas to explore on a normal run and the encouragement to go breakneck fast makes it even more entertaining the writing is fun but weirdly anachronistic why are all these scifi prisoners talking about modern brands and companies oh well its a good time
a lot of fast fun action im enjoying it a lot it shows a ton of growth im hoping they add a few more powers but im just starting its getting better each play

this game was obviously heavily inspired by hades they even namedrop it in a piece of dialogue but it adds to the hades formula to make it a new experience the character development and story arent near the same level as hades but its clear that was no accident redacted focuses on the action with upgrades and boons and new weapons to unlock interspersed by snappy dialogue   if you want to play a quality irreverent hadeslike with guns and space zombies this is your game

i didnt expect this game to be so much fun with tons of added chaos a bullet hell of fun and comedy everything is random so no telling what youre going to get with each challenge very fast paste and if you no on point youre pay the price

a fun roguelite action game with a decent infusion of humor  my only real complaint is that the meta progression is pretty slow and the difficulty is fairly punishing even by genre standards  no need to play callisto protocol to understand or enjoy this besides the shared setting there isnt anything important being missed  definitely worth playing if you like these action games

a fun roguelike though to be fair i havent played many im gonna be honest i bought this game to support the developers striking distance because i dont want them to give up on the callisto protocol ip just yet that game couldve been so much more than it ended up being and this game proves that hopefully this game resonates and they get to make another mainline installment oh and the stage 4 boss is an hole fair warning

alright i have to admit i played this for about an hour and thought it was just ok just another roguelike in a sea of clones but something about it keeps me coming back  the art style  love it  the music  rockin  the real hook though the absolutely fantastic bits of info you slowly uncover on your rivals and the random unhinged voice lines theyll drop during a run  does the gameplay stand out from others na not really  but id put this one on the short list for fun
